items.sentence: Long, long ago, there lived an old man in a village.
Long, long ago, there lived an old man and his wife.
Large amounts of money were spent on the new bridge.
The new engine must undergo all the necessary tests.
My grandma bent over to pick up a needle and thread.
My uncle went to Mexico in 1983, never to come back.
By the time I got to school, class was already over.
There weren't any customers so we closed shop early.
It took me a lot longer to do that than it took Tom.
Can you go more a bit more in-depth on that subject?
